content.detailedDescription: At around 7:56 pm, i took pictures of the moon in an automatic setting instead of manual, by accident. i used a tripod to minimize shaking. i saw nothing with the naked eye, and did not see the object while i was taking the photos. i realized the pictures were no good, but put them on the computer anyway. there seems to be a star like object in the upper left quadrant of the photo. it appears to change shape in each picture. i am unable to identify it.
content.summary: Upon viewing my failure at trying to photograph the moon, i discovered a bright "star" in the upper left quadrant of the picture, when i lodaded the photos onto my computer.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out on to the front porch to get a glimpse of all the stars that night, very clear night, the stars looked amazing, as i looked up i noticed a jet flying over going east, as i turn to look towards the south at the stars an object was coming in my direction from the southwest in the sky, as it got closer i could see it was triangle in shape, black, with round bright white lights on all three corners about the size of a eraser tip on a pencil with a round red one in the center of the triangle, the red light was a little bit smaller than the white ones, all on the underneath of the triangle, the lights did not blink or flash, just steady, there was no noise. the object traveled from the southwest to the northeast in a straight line pattern, the triangle object intersected with the jet with the jet being above it, looking at this, the triangle object was 3x bigger then the jet, could be that the jet was much higher up then the object, watched it till it was out of sight, told my husband about it when he came home from work, he said it was probably a stealth fighter, so i looked up "stealth fighter at night" on the internet and looked at some video clips, i can say no it was not a stealth fighter.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: Me, my parents and my neighbors all witnessed. at first i saw just one object coming in from the northeast, i thought it was a plane on fire, then seconds later there was another one. they both seemed to stop, hovered for 45 seconds or so, and flew away going southeast, then seemed to have disappeared. 2-3 minutes later a third one comes, also from the northeast, going the same route the previous 2 went, this time without stopping or hovering. i do have video footage but i don't want to leave it here. if someone from mufon contacts me, i will send them the footage.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 separate objects flew above us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying horizontal on the balkony just watching the sky when suddenly a bright silver "ball" showed up at sw  and breezed to se in an incredible speed without any sound or contrails and much faster than an airplane. 
i thought "wtf??" and my little dog left the balkony. then it disappeared in a cloud and was not seen again.
content.summary: Fast silver "ball" breezed from sw so se while i was laying on the balkony

content.detailedDescription:
Was on my way to get coffee with my girlfriend. 6:20am, july 18 2013. perfectly clear sky. noticed a huge star-like sphere in the sky with nothing else around it. it was way brighter than a morning star. i pointed it out to my girlfriend and about 3-5 sec after that, it grew very dim very quickly and took off leaving a small trail like that of a jet.

this was a huge object and it was a different "white" than a normal shining star.
content.summary: Huge bright star-like spere, no other visible stars. dissapated and took off leaving trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was having a cigarette in my garage when i heard a dog barking, only one dog which i found a little odd and a gut feeling told me to go look out side in the sky, i first noticed it cause it seemed odd for a start to be out still even though the sun was almost up and it seemed impossible. i had a feeling right away i was in contact with a et. it dematerilazided when i finished my smoke and put it in a ash tray, disapointed i turned arround to leave, but turned arround for one last glance and saw it was back, so i kept watching, it moved in a zig zag pattern up and then disapeared into thin air again and re apreared not far from where it had just been. my feeling was almost ectasy like, i was happy, excited and not a worry in the world, i noticed it became more and more distant as i heard other people walking down my street, thats when i stoped looking to glance off of my deck to see the people walking down the road, when i looked back up, it was gone
content.summary: Seemed like a very bright start in a odd place where the sunrises, as i watched it started to move arround

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking outside, went to the street looked up, after hoping to see a shooting star, i looked and found two objects moving in two different angles. they began to speed up and then slow down both at their own speeds. they were visuable for around a minute and 9 seconds.After realizing what just happened my vision was very dark like my eyes were dilated and i got chills and sweats.
content.summary: Two star-like objects moving in angles but at the same rate for one moment then changing

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside drinking coffee as i do quite often at night and at approx. 10:45 pm in rapid city, so. dak. when i observed a white star like object that i first noticed in the western sky at approx. the second star down from the top of the big dipper handle, moved to the no. east,  made a short abrupt turn and went in a northerly direction all in approx. 10 seconds until i lost sight of it. there was no flashing lights or anything else just a light. i am positive it was not a meteorite,  satellite or airplane as it moved far too fast and turned to sharp for either one. it was a clear night and there were no airplanes anywhere near.
content.summary: Fast moving object observed in night sky in south dakota

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home.
saw it in sky, watched it, about 20 seconds it moved then disappears distant in the sky.  pretty far.  thought it was a bright satellite.
very sharp pain in the head after disappearing.  never get headaches normally.
thought it was weird, looked up other ufo events today found a few outside pewaukee.
content.summary: Path, bright, then gone

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on my scooter(moped) from eastern side of iowa city, headed to western part of iowa city, i was on east burlington street headed west, right after i passed through the intersection of south gilbet and east burlington, i noticed what seemed to be some lights above me, as i drive this road every day it seemed a little odd. when i looked up i was just in peer shock!!! there was a very large craft above me, it blocked out all stars and a majority of the night sky. the object looked as though it was hovering at first, however, as i continued on east burlington in a west direction i came to a red stop light at linn street, that's when i got a superb look at it. being on my scooter i had a non obstructed view of the craft, the craft wasn't hovering, it was moving very, very slowly se at no more than 1-5 knots. there was no sound what so ever! the lights on the craft where interesting, there where 2 lights, one was a pink to red to white light, the other was a blue to green to white light. the lights where slowly changing like christmas tree lights. the craft was a triangle shape in dark color, i cant say it was black necessarily but it was very dark (it was night). i unfortunately was already late to work and could not take a photo. how ever i did observe the craft as i continued to work until buildings obstructed my view, this sighting from start to end was roughly 5-10 minutes. i grew up next moffitt air field in mountain view, ca, where i have seen everything from the space shuttle (nasa is on moffitt) to stealth bombers (prior to being announced to the public) landing at moffitt before i was even 12 years old. my step-dad also worked at aimes research center (he was a robotics engineer) at moffitt, and i was in the navy and and worked for nato. i have been stationed in iceland, meridian, norfolk, just to name a few. i was always on a naval air station, i am very proficient in air craft for obvious reasons, and i have never seen any thing like this, ever!!
content.summary: Craft moving at very slow rate, maybe 5 knots in se direction above downtown iowa city

content.detailedDescription:
El evento sucedio en la serena,chile el  10/01/010 a las 20:36 horas,tras pasear por el centro de la serena un amigo se atraso para probar la camara y saco una foto,sin mas atencion a la misma.La foto quedo archivada en una carpeta y nunca se borro a pesar de ser una foto sin inportancia,pasaron tres a������os cuando estando aburrido en mi casa me puse a ver en detalle fotos varias y fue cuando descubri esos dos objetos que me llamaron la atenci������n.
si observan la foto veran los dos objetos mas alla de una linea de arboles,y de primer plano se observa a una mujer que lleva a un ni������o en brazos y ambos parecen estar mirando al cielo pero no se si estan mirando esos dos objetos.E llegado a suponer que podria ser un avion peque������o como un cesna,un avion de propaganda que lleva amarrado un globo pero no tengo la seguridad,como es una foto que me causa cierta intriga e decidido mandarcela para ver al final que son esos dos objetos.                                                                                                                                                         
 posdata:en time zone puse san juan en argentina por que la serena no figura pero esta a la misma altura que san juan.
content.summary: Son dos objetos,uno cilindrico y otro en forma de misil de colores grises-blancos.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were standing outside of his car in a small parking lot, around 10:00 pm in springfield ma on july 17, 2013, when something strange caught my eye. it appeared to be fairly low in the sky but still high enough so that i was unable tell if it was something out of the ordinary until it descended more. i first witnessed it about 100 feet above the ground. from where i was standing i first spotted it in the upper right portion of the sky. i'm unsure which direction (north, south, east, or west). we thought it was an airplane at first but there were no flashing lights, just a glowing, solid, red, round object. i could tell it was not on fire. there were absolutely no clouds in sight.  it slowly moved across the sky, descending toward the ground from right to left.  it made no noise at all. it seemed only about 15 to 20 feet away from the ground when it was closest. the red color then completely faded, leaving the same small shape only it appeared to be a very light gray color and was almost transparent. the color reminded me of how the moon looks in the middle of the day. it  from right to left in a descending motion. i witnessed it for approximately 2 minutes before it completely vanished. and i have never seen anything like it in my life. i didn't fear it, i was just interested in knowing what it possibly could have been.

i provided an image from the internet that is remarkably similar to what we witnessed.
content.summary: Red, glowing, circular in shape

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my back patio when i observed a strange red light falling from the sky over a military gun range.  i then observed a standard small aircraft behind it.  the red light then seemed to pause for a minute or 2 i called inside the house for my husband to come out who saw it as well.  we watched it slowly change from a north path  to a sudden change to a westerly flight path.  at that time we called the kids to come out and see it.  we all watched it fly slowly over the western low hills over the military base (behind the low mountains). it was followed by what sounded like a small standard plane.  we all watched it for a full 2 minutes until it was out of out of sight behind the low mountains.  no recording was possible due to outside light sources in the neighborhood.
content.summary: Bright blinking red light over military gun rang followed by aircraft with standard light

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in the middle of a lightning storm taking photos and i seen what looked to be a shooting star but there there were more coming. they were coming down almost then they would turn off the light and then turn it on again and take off so fast, i couldn't see them.
the object appeared to be round with an extremely bright light on the bottom that would turn on and off.
the object would almost stop with it's lights on and then suddenly turn it off and take off lower to the ground and then turn the light on and then take off again with the light off. 
i was scared but confused and i wanted to take photos of it. i only have one photo that you can barely see the round light in.
i lost sight of it because of the lightning and it would fly so fast with the light's off. 

it definitely was not a helicopter, airplane, or anything like that because the lighting is horrible tonight. it is a thunderstorm with rain and very bad lightning.

i attached 2 photos, one of the ufo and one of the lightning showing how bad it was.
content.summary: Bad lightning storm when many came flying in different directions close together

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:30pm on 7/12/2013 while letting my dog out i was standing in my drive talking to my son when this ball dropped out of the clouds. the brightness of it is what caught us. we watched it droop and then come to a stop. as it drooped though i noticed it had a light blue flamed tail coming off the top. then when it came to a stop the tail came down into it. it hovered for a few seconds then moved quickly to the left again with a tail coming out from the right and then when it stopped the tail moved back into it. the tail would appear each time it moved. then it moved extremely fast to the right and stopped once again just hovering. then slowly moved back to center and stopped. this is when i started to take mental notes. the center of it was bright sun orange and moved. the only way i can describe it is it moved like lava. out side the sphere around the edge line was a light blue glow i guess like a radiant heat coming from it. the size was huge. if you were standing beside a commercial airliner that's the size it was but at two to two and a half miles out. so i'm sure if it was right over me it would of been much larger. the sound... none. nothing came from this thing. at all. it is very quit in our nieghborhood and there was nothing else in the sky around it. i made a note to look around for anything else in the sky. once it came back to center it stayed for a few more seconds then dropped down making a u shape in the sky. then in tenths of a second shot off due west and was gone. i know what it wasn't, i just don't know what it was.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extremely large bright ball of light with a controlled flight pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Not first sighting- at approximately 10:27 pm my neighbor called and ask me to look up at mtn  and tell him what they were- when i got outside i saw orange lights appearing on side of mtn facing my house. as they appeared they moved out of the trees and headed out to center of valley where the seemed to wait for each other,as they got closer together they lined up in sets of three verticly with 20 or 30 feet between them, once each group had three lights they started gaining altitude and once they got around 3500 ft they started disappearing from the top light down. three groups of three did the exact same thing and when the third group started disappearing 2 more lights appeared on side of mtn and they headed in same direction as others but moving a lot faster and dissappeared at about same altitude.  this whole process happened in less than 5 min. i live on adjacent mtn  and they appeared halfway up mtn at about same elevation as my home and the mtn is less than a half mile away. my family also witnessed this as well as two other people. there wasn't any sound. i witnessed the same kind of lights about 6 or 7 years ago but  they formed two triangles instead of vertical lines and seemed to have smaller objects going back and forth between the orange lights. cant explain but i will be definitely be watching that area. didn't get any pictures but after checking the internet there is a lot of pics and videos of what looks to be same things
content.summary: They appeared on side of mtn and the moved to center of vally -lined up in rows of three then ascended to 3500 ft ten disappeared one at a time

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the sky when a bright orange flash caught my eye the flash was the object coming into sight from behond horizon my first though was it was a meteor burning up but wasn't burning up it flew directly over me and the orange light i saw seeing was unlike any orange i light i have ever seen before it only lasted about 7 seconds before clearing the opposite horizon, i may add that this is the same date people in nyc claimed to see ufos and was on the news. i saw what many people must of pointed up and shouted for everyone to look at saw. i now conclude that the orange light was  ionized air around the craft used for magnetic propulsion. ill never forget the sight.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Thought was a meteor burning up came from one horizon directly over me dissaperard over the oppisite horizon bright orange super fast object

content.detailedDescription:
At 01:13 07/17/2013 eastern. while out photographing stars noticed on one photo a unknown object. looking se in westland, mi

camera: canon eos rebel t3
aperture: f/5.6
shutter speed: 2 sec
iso: 6400
focal length: 300mm
content.summary: Photographing stars noticed on one photo unknown object

content.detailedDescription: My family, myself , my husband and two daughters were traveling home from buena vista to alamosa on colorado hwy 17. we were approximately 20miles from alamosa when we noticed a bright blue flashing light quite a ways in the distance. at first we thought it was maybe a police car. then it started moving in a straight horizontal line in hops that had to be at least 2 to 3 miles in distance. it looked as though it were traveling on a road at first but then as it traveled from south around to the east then on to the north it was not following any roads. it moved faster than humanly possible and as it reached the north behind us it vanished completely. during all of this we also noticed that small animals were out in force and running towards the lights. there were so many that i couldn't avoid actually hitting a couple of them. all of this occurred between 12:30 a.M. and 1:00 a.M. on july 5,2013. we all were stunned by what we saw and have no idea what it could have been.
content.summary: Bright blue light flashing and moving horizontally in several mile bursts

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11:00 pm i was on my deck smoking with my mother-in-law (pat). my girlfriend (crystal) was inside yet coming to join us. as pat and i were talking i happened to look towards the western sky and saw what looked like a star but it was moving slowly from the south to the north before fading out.

if you were to hold a ruler at arms length that's about the distance it traveled across the sky. pat and i both were saying "what the hell is that?"

about 30 seconds after it disappeared crystal came out and teased us when we told her.... until 5 minutes later it was back, and did the exact same thing. same spot. same speed. 

another 5 minutes, same thing again. 3 times total, never saw it again.

i'm not good at judging distances distances but whatever it was was very far away. from our perspective it seemed to be moving slow, but i'm betting the distance it crossed was many miles in a short period of time. i'm certain this was not a plane.
content.summary: Light crossed sky 3 times in same spot over 15 minute period.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately between 11pm and 4am. awakened by the dog at approx 11pm or 12am checken on animal for water, food, condition. animal was ok and satisfied. went back to bed, back to sleep... 30 to 45 min maybe longer awakened by the dog again, sounded distressed and yelping. went back outside and checked to see if dog was bothered by something. looked around and saw strobing lights approximately 3 miles ne of property. got binoculars and looked, retrieved, child, dog and keys to vehicle and drove into town to the nearest location or approximate location for a closer look. found above a water tower just out of town near the back side of the high school ... looked again in binoculars to large to determine size had a smaller attachment to it and we became scared and tried to hurry out off the bluff but the road had been rutted out by water washing off the bluff. once off the bluff drove back out of town to residence, let the dog out and it ran away, never saw the dog again. arrival time was approximated 330am to 4am loss track of time. next morning friend arrived at the home and told us there had been a ufo siting and i told her we saw it, we had a contact with it. didnt report it because it seemed like it was normal and not important to anyone but us. later i attempted to find out if there had been other instances of other 1997 sightings. emailed roswell and it was unimportant to them. saw a show on larry king cnn and got the mans name who stated there was a sighting in arizona and contacted him by email and the return email seemed unimpoartant to them.... i let it go untill i began to experience harassing events approximately 2009, began with a property purchase and my dogs being poisoned , my pc stolen various other torments. called about the aztec research by mr. ramsey and i was directed to report it online. have tried to search it out myself and i am not getting any responce. mhmr thinks i am crazy and i need medication because of my intuitive information that happenes to me. dont know what else to do! followed the trail as far as i can alone, need help!
content.summary: August 27th 1997 aztec nm

content.detailedDescription:
at about 10pm i was driving down a road in the middle of bellingham, wa towards the i-5 on-ramp when i saw a red orb light that was about 5 times bigger than a star in the southern sky, off to my left.  i turned left and immediately pulled off the road and jumped out of the car and quickly grabbed my binoculars out of the trunk and viewed the red orb light as it got very small and went out.  there was a medium gray colored looking craft where the light had been.  it silently descended quickly to almost right in front of me, directly above (60 - 100 ft) the road.  it slowed at this point to rotate around.  i had a great view of it.  it was textured metal looking with a larger rounded front and a square rear area where two exhaust engine holes were (see sketch). it was about the size of a large tall suv but not an extended length.  i didn't see any windows or insignia, nor even tiny lights.  for a second there i felt some concern we might be it's target but then it turned east over a building, into the back parking area and then north as it dropped below the tree line.  it knew precisely where it wanted to go.  with extreme precision it manuvered itself down and executed perfect turns avoiding electrical poles, wires and street lights.  

     it was very stealth.  it also timed it's descent to when the traffic was very light.  we don't recall anybody driving past us while we watched it. as it descended, it pretty much followed the road as it descended from the southern sky heading north.

     after the ufo descended behind the trees, we drove around searching for it but didn't find it.  it didn't occur to us to drive into that building's parking lot. 

     i went back 4 days later and drove into that parking lot during the daytime and discovered some woods were located where the ufo appeared to go.  i found a small clearing where it could have hid out of sight. i also took photos of the field where the grass was mashed down and blown around some.  i don't know that the ufo mashed the grass.  the mashed down grass looked a little yellowed.  it could be that deer slept there. i did not see any deer.  i talked to a couple of neighbors in the area and one thought it might have been that night that their tv power or reception flickered a bit.
content.summary: Saw descending red glowing orb.  light went out and revealed a gray metallic craft (see sketch) that came down in front of us and rotated around to turn right and then left as it descended behind trees and possibly landed.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just returned home from a road trip with a friend. i had noticed the strange partial ring around the evening sun. as i returned home i took my wife upto the top floor of our home and looked out of the window at the phenomenon and proceeded to take photos on my mobile phone (samsung galaxy s2). it wasn't until we were looking at the photos that i noticed in one of the pictures there appears to be two objects one looked to be metalic and spherical and the other looked to be more like a disk shape also a solid metalic object. we did not see or hear anything at the time and there is nothing on any of the other pictures taken. 

please look at the attached photo. the objects can be seen on the left hand side of the picture close to the light phenomenon around the sun.
content.summary: Unseen until reviewing pictures taken of strange ring around the sun

content.detailedDescription: While driving down the road i witnessed something in the sky,moving around with a red light on the bottom and nothing else. i thought it was a helicopter. when i got closer i seen a triangle shaped ufo that was now stationary, hovering over the treetops, with now not only the red light, but circular lights on each of the three corners of the bottom of the vehicle. also there was a red and blue light on the bottom of the middle of the vehicle. i had passed almost directly under it as i was driving down the road so i was a maximum of 200-250ft away from it at my closest point. i could not believe that a vehicle of this size had no sound emitting from it.
content.summary: Hovering above the tree tops.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the stars and then noticed 3 unknown flying objects. they where all going in diffrent directions. they kept apearing out of no where. they where very bright and all diffrent colors. most of them had steady movment. some where hovering and shaky. there was about 25 of them i saw. it was at 12:30. our airport has a curfew at 11:00. ufo aircraft made very weird static sound. i tried to film it on my phone but then my phine froze and shut off. after they were gone my phone was working again. the battery drained rapidly. also tv shutoff.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: About 25-30 ufos flying. 3 at a time. came out of no where

content.detailedDescription: My handy-man's son captured this image from his ipod touch standing in his bedroom in their apartment in west hollywood.  they wish to remain anonymous and didn't even want to circulate this photo.  the boy stated that he looked out his window and saw this shape.  he then called down to his mother and sister to quickly come up and see it.  he captured the photo quickly and as his sister ran downstairs and outside to view it from another angle, it disappeared.
content.summary: Ship hovered outside apartment window

content.detailedDescription: Saw an bright object isln the sky.  lights started out very bright and then started pulsating across the sky.  started out from se and went n/ ne and then veered nw where i lost it in cloud cover.  the object covered a very long distance in a very short amount of time.  i recorded this event and have video as well as two pictures.  it was a bit after 10 at night on the 12th of july 2013.  i look at the sky a lot but this object was so bright when i first went outside it shocked me.  next to the moon, it was the brightest thing in the sky.  i lost it after a minute or so in so e cloud cover to the nw.  the only way i can describe it is a fireball the way it shined.
content.summary: Ball of fire flying across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My 23 year old son went to idyllwild, ca. this weekend 07/15/2013 and sent this picture to me and i noticed this object can not be the sun cause the shadows of the sun do not face towards the viewer of the picture so i thought i should send it to mufon to try and decide.
content.summary: My 23 year old son took this picture of what appears to be a ufo in idyllwild, ca.
